text: GWR may refer to: ==Transport== * Genesee & Wyoming, an American railroad holding company * Gloucestershire Warwickshire Railway, an English heritage railway * Great Western Railway (disambiguation) == Media == * GWR Group, a defunct British commercial radio company **GWR FM (Bristol & Bath) ** GWR FM Wiltshire * GWR Records, a British record label * Graswurzelrevolution, a German anarcho-pacifist magazine == Other uses == * Geographically weighted regression * Guinness World Records * Llygad Gŵr, 13th-century Welsh poet
title: GWR
